trans-unit.source: In the Visual Studio **Solution Explorer**, right-click the project and select **Add > Docker Support** from the context menu.
trans-unit.target: In the Visual Studio **Solution Explorer**, right-click the project and select **Add > Docker Support** from the context menu.

trans-unit.source: Adding Docker support to an ASP.NET Core web project results in the addition of several Docker-related files being added to the project, including Docker-Compose files, deployment Windows PowerShell scripts, and Docker property files.
trans-unit.target: Adding Docker support to an ASP.NET Core web project results in the addition of several Docker-related files being added to the project, including Docker-Compose files, deployment Windows PowerShell scripts, and Docker property files.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If using the [Docker for Windows Beta](https://beta.docker.com), open Properties\Docker.props, remove the default value and restart Visual Studio for the value to take effect.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If using the [Docker for Windows Beta](https://beta.docker.com), open Properties\Docker.props, remove the default value and restart Visual Studio for the value to take effect.
